welcome.title: 🎉 Welcome to LuckyMart TJ Lucky Market!
welcome.message:
🌟 Dear {firstName}, welcome to Lucky Market!

Here you can participate in lotteries for your favorite products:
• 1 Lottery Coin = 1 share, ultra-low threshold
• New users get 50 Lottery Coins as welcome gift 🎁
• 3 free daily participations
• Fair and transparent lottery algorithm

Your account has been created. Current balance: {balance} Lottery Coins

Click the button below to enter the Lucky Market and start your lucky journey!

registration_reward.title: 🎁 Registration Reward Received
registration_reward.message:
🎉 Congratulations! Registration reward has been credited

Reward amount: {rewardAmount} Lottery Coins
Current balance: {balance} Lottery Coins

Thank you for choosing LuckyMart TJ! Start your lucky journey now ~

balance.title: 💰 Account Balance
balance.message:

Click the buttons below to recharge or view more

vip_level_up.title: 👑 VIP Level Up!

help.title: ❓ Help Center
help.message:
📚 Command List:

/start - Start using
/balance - Check balance
/orders - View orders
/language - Switch language
/profile - Personal profile
/support - Contact support
/help - View help

Need help? Click the buttons below:

language_changed.title: ✅ Language Changed
language_changed.message:
Your interface language has been successfully changed to {language}.

If you need to switch to another language, please use the /language command.

referral_reward.title: 🎁 Referral Reward Received
referral_reward.message:
🎉 Congratulations! Your referred user has completed registration

Referral reward: {rewardAmount} Lottery Coins
Current balance: {balance} Lottery Coins

Continue referring more friends to earn more rewards!

support.title: 💬 Customer Support
support.message:
💬 Contact Us

Support Hours: Monday - Sunday 9:00-22:00

Contact Information:
- Telegram Support: @luckymart_support
- Support Email: support@luckymart.tj

Common Issues:
- Payment Issues: Reply within 24 hours
- Lottery Disputes: Immediate handling
- Account Issues: Real-time response

We promise to provide you with the best service!

tutorial.title: 📚 Tutorial
tutorial.message:
📚 Tutorial

🎯 How to Participate in Lotteries:
1. Choose your favorite product
2. Buy lottery shares (1 share = 1 lottery coin)
3. Wait for the draw time
4. Wait for the lucky number announcement
5. Winner receives the product

💰 How to Get Lottery Coins:
- New user registration: 50 lottery coins
- Daily free participation: 3 times
- Recharge to buy more shares

🎁 Participation Rules:
- Fair and transparent draws using blockchain technology
- Fixed draw times for each round
- Automatic delivery after winning

Feel free to contact customer service with any questions!

resale_status.title: 📈 Resale Status Update

status_messages.created:

status_messages.matching:
Looking for buyers for you
Estimated matching time: 5-10 minutes
status_messages.sold:
Resale successful!
Funds credited (5% fee deducted)
